briefTitle: A Study Evaluating the Efficacy and Safety of Tislelizumab Versus Chemotherapy in Advanced Non-Squamous Non-small Cell Lung Cancer
officialTitle: A Phase 3, Open-Label, Multicenter, Randomized Study to Investigate the Efficacy and Safety of Tislelizumab (BGB-A317) (Anti-PD1 Antibody) Combined With Platinum-Pemetrexed Versus Platinum-Pemetrexed Alone as First-line Treatment for Patients With Stage IIIB or IV Non-Squamous Non-Small Cell Lung Cancer
summary: This study evaluated the efficacy and safety of tislelizumab in combination with platinum (cisplatin or carboplatin) and pemetrexed compared with platinum and pemetrexed alone as first-line treatment in participants with Stage IIIB or IV non-squamous non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC).

primaryOutcome.measure: Progression Free Survival (PFS) Assessed by Independent Review Committee (IRC) Assessment
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: Through primary analysis data cut-off date of 23JAN2020 (up to approximately 1 year and 6 months)
